title: Trigger installation from your PWA
summary: By default, if the user visits your website, and the browser determines that the site is installable as a PWA, then the browser will display some built-in UI — an icon in the URL bar, for example — to install the site. If the user clicks the icon, then the browser shows an install prompt containing, at a minimum, the app's name and icon. If the user agrees to install the app, then it will be installed.
